nodes.text: The Scitrok Warriors were a society of warrior-monks that lived in a monastery in the hills near Varno Market on the planet Vengler. They spent their time in their early life learning equally about religion and combat. Their preferred weapon was the Scitrok, which they took 10 years to master on average. Once their training was complete, they were sent to sell their talents to anyone willing to pay to support the monastery. The locals on Vengler tried to avoid them usually.
